content: No, she lost the election. 98% of counties voted against her. Los Angeles and New York, should not decide who is president. I would also argue that there are millions of immigrants, legal and illegal, that are registered to vote. In 2005 the government accountability office determined that 3% of individuals summoned for jury duty were not citizens. Jury selection pools come from voter registrations. No state has access to federal citizenship records to check during voter registration. 200,000,000 registered voters in the last election, auto registrations in CA. Do the math.
